modName: Airy Armor Black-Purple Retexture by Darkblader707
descriptionHtml:
AIRY ARMOR BLACK-PURPLE RETEXTURE

Requirements:
 - Airy Armor Black-Red Retexture by Darkblader707 --- Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20599/

Description:
 - This is a retexture of the Airy Armor by Darkblader707
 - This version replaces the Black-Red Version

Installation:
 - Use NMM (nexus mod manager)
 - extract manually to \"Data\" folder in ur skyrim directory

How to get:
CONSOLE:
- press ` on your keyboard to open console
- type \"help airy 4\"
- type \"player.additem <code of the armor> 1\"
- example \"player.additem 4fff101 1\"

FORGE:
- craft it on the blacksmith forge ( i think it\'s on ebony category )

Credits:
- CREDIT TO THE ORIGINAL CREATOR OF AIRY ARMOR > TONA

ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE IT
COMMENT ON WHAT DESIGN I SHOULD MAKE =)
author: Darkblader707
